Only 24% of nurses surveyed think their employer is providing a safe workplace.

Reuse of PPE, lack of testing, unsafe staffing, and lack of dedicated #COVID19 units put nurses at risk of exposure to this deadly virus. #ProtectNurses https://t.co/yYg3iSNXX5
